H0.text: Neutrons are the number added to the number of protons when naming isotopes.

H1.text: Isomers are the part added to the number of protons when naming isotopes.

H2.text: Electrons are the number added to the number of protons when naming isotopes.

H3.text: Nuclei are the quantity added to the number of protons to name isotopes.

A4.text: The number of nucleons (both protons and neutrons) in the nucleus is the atom's mass number.
